content: holiday motif can be worked in 3 colors of your choice to suit any holiday skill level easy-intermediate materials worsted weight yarn in 3 colors approx 10 yds each colors a & b 20 yds color c size h/8 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to achieve gauge tapestry needle gauge 14 single_crochet = 4 on size h/8 5 mm hook finished motif measures approx 8 from point to point 4 5 along each side before blocking 9 from point to point after blocking terms/abbreviations beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet each ea increase increase long single_crochet long single_crochet remaining rem repeat repeat round round slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet yarn over yo special stitches long single_crochet long single_crochet insert hook in top of double_crochet 3 row below pull up loop loosely to height of current row to avoid puckering fabric yo and complete single_crochet 1 motif round 1 with color a chain 4 join into ring or use disappearing beginning loop method wrap yarn around finger once insert hook into this loop yarn over and draw strand through chain 3 work 11 double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 fasten_off color a 12 double_crochet round 2 increase round join color b to top of any double_crochet chain 3 work double_crochet in same st *2 double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 24 double_crochet round 3 increase round chain 3 work double_crochet in same st *chain 2 skip 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around ending chain 2 join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 fasten_off color b 12 2-double_crochet groups 12 chain-2 spaces round 4 increase round join color a in top of second double_crochet of any 2-double_crochet group chain 1 single_crochet in same st 2 single_crochet in next space *single_crochet in ea of next 2 double_crochet 2 single_crochet in next space repeat from * around ending with single_crochet in last double_crochet join with slip_stitch 48 single_crochet round 5 increase round chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in ea of next 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch fasten_off color a 60 single_crochet round 6 increase round join color c in first of the 2 single_crochet that began round 5 chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet single_crochet in ea of next 3 single_crochet work long single_crochet loosely see note above in top of double_crochet 3 rounds below work long single_crochet in top of next double_crochet 3 rounds below single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet at point single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet long single_crochet in next double_crochet 3 rounds below long single_crochet in next double_crochet 3 rounds below single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet at point repeat from * around join with
